edu.caltech.sbw
Class ServiceMethod

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.caltech.sbw.ServiceMethod
public class ServiceMethod
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to describe a method on a service. In the Java SBW API, its role is limited to being informational only, although in some of the other language bindings the ServiceMethod class has additional functionality.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
Michael Hucka, $Author: mhucka $

Method Detail

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of this method.

Returns:
a string, the method name

getSignatureString

public java.lang.String getSignatureString()
Returns the signature string for this method. This is a string representation of the parsed signature returned by getSignature().

Returns:
the signature string

getSignature

public Signature getSignature()
Returns a structure representing the signature of the method. The Signature object provides access to a parsed representation of the individual components of a method signature.

Returns:
the Signature object

getHelp

public java.lang.String getHelp()
Returns the help string for this method.
